__e: Well, everything seems to be in order.
Oh, you look splendid, just as you are.
Here she is right now, and she's looking mighty fine to me!
We were having an awfully good time before you showed up, too, however.
Um, she's been having a great time since she got in, isn't that right?
Okay, okay, that-that came out wrong, but you have to admit, you all had a wonderful time.
